overview:
PROJECT MANAGER with extensive experience and more than 8 years of success in promoting IT and ITES strategic vision through strategy, design and architecture. Innovative professional with proven ability to identify, analyze and solve problems to increase customer satisfaction and control costs through expertise in:

  • Outsourcing Strategies
  • IT Project Budget Analysis
  • Staff Training & Development
  • Multi-Projects Management
  • Cross Functional Team Leadership
  • Performance Management
  • Quality Control
  • Productivity Improvement
  • Ability to direct complex projects
  • Cost/Time/Risk/Integration Management
  • Client Training and Management
  • Cost Reduction Programs
  • Excellent interpersonal skills in communications, client relations, and negotiation.
